titleInfo.title: Letter No 26 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a translation of a firmaun [firman] from Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, Prince at Sheraz [Shiraz], received on 4 July 1822. The firmaun urges the Resident's early compliance with his summons to Sheraz, so that he may then proceed to the Persian Court at Tehran. The letter notes that it is the Resident's intention to proceed to Sheraz on 13 July 1822.
